review: Dr listened to the issues patiently and explained various courses of action. Many online doctors are indifferent and just want to somehow finish the call. Dr. Ruchi is not like that. She listens, takes time to understand, asks questions, and suggests.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
*** ***** ************ **** ** * **** **** *** *** ** ******** ********** I was with high sugar levels before meeting mam. Now, within 3 months my Diabetic levels have almost come to Normal. Dr. Ruchi is such a friendly doctor. Half of our disease would reduce talking to her. Mam, also gives medication which suit's my health. Not, like other Diabetic doctor's giving high medication and getting my sugar in control suddenly. 

Very, Proud to say the Dr Ruchi is the best doctor. Also, very thankful to my Dr Vishwesh who introduced me to Mam. **** *** ******** *** *** **** ** ***** ****** 

Would, really suggest people to go to such doctors. Who can reduce half our sickness through a friendly talk and rest with medication. 
God Bless, my both sweet doctor's and there family üôè
reply_text: Thank you for your kind feedback!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was treated by her and as yet counseling her routinely. I discovered Dr. Ruchi Satyesh truly reasonably and understanding. Dr.Ruchi is Very clear in her methodology, which fulfills a patient's nervousness. Dr. Ruchi is a Dr as well as an excellent person too. I have all gratefulness for her. The main advantage I admire is that we don't have to explain our medical history every time, she remembers and advises us accordingly. 

He is the best Physician in south Bangalore and reasonable as well. numerous Physicians charge an exceptionally high sum, yet Dr.Ruchi offers services at a reasonable cost.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind feedback!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a tele consultation with Dr. Ruchi. She is the most calm and ideal doctor for a patient that I have met. Calmly understood all my issues and suggested all necessary actions to take care of it. She tried to minimize the medicine intake and suggested alternative care actions.She would now be my go to doctor for any issues. Thank you for your support.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind feedback!!!!

tags: None
review: I don't recommend the doctor. The whole interaction with the doctor was less than 5 minutes. The doctor didn't diagnose. The doctor wasn't listening to health concerns but only judging the concerns. I had a weight gain issue and was not even interested to find the reason but recommended to another doctor. I had an Acne issue and was again recommended to a skin doctor. In short, I consulted to ask for directions to another doctor. I had a history of psychological issues and she just said you shouldn't consult a psychiatrist *** **** **** ****** *********** ********* She had no interest to understand the health concern. One of the doctor which I do not recommend to any.
reply_text:
At the outset I thank you for the feedback given and sincerely appreciate your concerns.

You should understand that your and not just overweight but obese and that too on the higher side. Please also note that you have significantly gained this weight in past 3 months which in my opinion I feel that you need an Endocrinologist opinion at the earliest.

In regard to your acne, I had to recommend you to visit, a Dermatologist to have a right kind of treatment as the acne is severe keeping in mind the complication involved.

In regard to your psychiatric issue, you confirmed me that you have visited number of Psychiatrists to address your issues and having taking several medications. Now you reached out to me for treatment of tremors also. Here I advised you to channelise your mediation in constatation with your treating Psychiatrists. 

Finally I wish to state that, I being a Family Physician need to guide my patients to the right speciality treating doctor in case if it is not my domain which I have done so in your case doing justice to you and my duty.

Thank you.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
The doctor was in a hurry and she had to scrutinise a blood report and advise. She was in such a hurry started rattling the deficiency and food to take. Was in such speed was difficult to follow her.she did not bother to check if we understood also. She said she has other appointments and was impatient before we could upload the report. If she did not have time she should have reschduled the appointment.
She did not take time to understand our concerns at all.

tags: None
review:
I went to dr in very high fever along with my small kid. She first told to put mask. I requested that I am not in a situation to go out as I am feeling very week. She was totally out of empathy. She was talking very loudly that I can't let anyone enter without mask.
Many good dr do keep masks at there clinic and help the patients. She was very very rude that I felt to cry. Somehow I managed to reach her and how stone hearted she is.üôÑüôÑüôÑüôÑüòì
reply_text:
Dear Rachna

I have no idea of you had come to the clinic today, hence the review above in regards to me is unacceptable. Further more we have a strict policy of wearing a mask during a patient‚Äôs visit to the clinic as in other clinics or hospitals keeping our patient‚Äôs at priority and social responsibility for which I think you will also agree.
